pages.text: The $(animus)Tier 6 Blood Altar$() represents the pinnacle of sanguine architecture. Unlike previous tiers, it requires a unique material that bridges the gap between blood magic and demon will.$(br2)The $(will)Crystallized Demon Will Block$() serves as the altar's capstone, replacing the traditional inversion pillar caps used in earlier designs.

$(will)Crystallized Demon Will Blocks$() are registered as valid CRYSTAL components for Blood Magic altars. They must be placed at specific positions in the tier 6 structure.$(br2)These blocks harness the power of demon will in its most concentrated form, providing the necessary resonance for tier 6 altar operations.

pages.title: Building the Structure
pages.text: Use the $(blood)Sanguine Diviner$() to visualize the tier 6 altar structure:$(br)$(li)Right-click the altar to see ghost blocks$(li)Sneak + right-click to enable auto-placement$(li)The diviner will show where Crystallized Demon Will Blocks are needed$(br2)The tier 6 altar requires these blocks at the upper corners of the structure.

pages.title: Crafting the Blocks
pages.text: $(will)Crystallized Demon Will Blocks$() are forged using the $(blood)Hellfire Forge$() with powerful reagents:$(br)$(li)Sculk$(li)Ethereal Slate$(li)Weak Blood Shard$(li)Nether Star$(br2)The recipe requires a minimum of 2048 demon will and drains 1024 will per craft.
The fusion of blood magic's most potent materials with demon will creates a stable crystalline structure capable of channeling immense power.

pages.title: Tier 6 Benefits
pages.text: Once completed, the tier 6 altar provides:$(br)$(li)Maximum LP capacity$(li)Fastest crafting speed$(li)Access to the most powerful blood magic rituals$(li)Enhanced efficiency for all altar operations$(br2)The fusion of blood magic and demon will creates unprecedented power.
